includedAssets.title: Scooby-Doo
includedAssets.synopsis: The cowardly cartoon dog is hungry for adventure with meddling human pals Shaggy and the gang. Spooky fun with Matthew Lillard and Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The cowardly cartoon dog is hungry for adventure with human pals Shaggy and the gang. Spooky fun with Matthew Lillard and Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The cowardly cartoon dog is hungry for adventure with meddling human pals Shaggy and the gang. Spooky fun with Matthew Lillard and Sarah Michelle Gellar.

includedAssets.title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
includedAssets.synopsis: Sequel to the live action/animated hit based on the much-loved Hanna-Barbera cartoons. This time the spookbusting gang is up against an Evil Masked Figure who has a machine that can recreate all the quintet's previous fiendish foes. Freddie Prinze Jr, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Linda Cardellini return as the intrepid Fred, Daphne and Velma but the show once again belongs to Matthew Lillard's lily-livered Shaggy and the CGI Scooby-Doo.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A masked villain lets loose a ghostly gang of Scooby's old enemies on Coolsville. Comedy spookfest with Sarah Michelle Gellar and the cowardly hound.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sequel to the live action/animated hit based on the much-loved Hanna-Barbera cartoons. This time the spookbusting gang is up against an Evil Masked Figure who has a machine that can recreate all the quintet's previous fiendish foes. Freddie Prinze Jr, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Linda Cardellini return as the intrepid Fred, Daphne and Velma but the show once again belongs to Matthew Lillard's lily-livered Shaggy and the CGI Scooby-Doo.

includedAssets.title: Scooby-Doo! The Mystery Begins
includedAssets.synopsis: Live action prequel telling how the cowardly canine and his four teenage pals - Daphne, Velma, Fred and Shaggy - became the best crime-solving team since Holmes and Watson. Unjustly accused of staging a spooky practical joke complete with ghosts, the kids are suspended from Coolsville High. To clear their names, they team up to unravel the supernatural mystery... Energetic adventure with an animated Scoob and added yoiks!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Discover how Shaggy, Scooby and co first got together in this amazing live-action adventure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Live action prequel telling how the cowardly canine and his four teenage pals - Daphne, Velma, Fred and Shaggy - became the best crime-solving team since Holmes and Watson. Unjustly accused of staging a spooky practical joke complete with ghosts, the kids are suspended from Coolsville High. To clear their names, they team up to unravel the supernatural mystery... Energetic adventure with an animated Scoob and added yoiks!

includedAssets.title: Scooby-Doo! Curse Of The Lake Monster
includedAssets.synopsis: When a mysterious monster begins terrorising a country club it falls to Scooby, Shaggy and co to crack the case. Live-action adventure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a mysterious monster begins terrorising a country club it falls to Scooby, Shaggy and co to crack the case. Live-action adventure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When a mysterious monster begins terrorising a country club it falls to Scooby, Shaggy and co to crack the case. Live-action adventure.

includedAssets.title: Scooby-Doo! Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: A cowardly dog and his human pals hit the road to investigate mysterious goings-on and solve spooky crimes. A double-bill of theatrical blockbusters and two TV movie prequels. Freddie Prinze Jr and Sarah Michelle Gellar star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A cowardly dog and his human pals hit the road to solve spooky crimes. A double-bill of theatrical blockbusters and two TV movie prequels.
